text: Ili govorit': "Yesli by nam bylo nisposlano Pisaniye, to my verneye by ikh shli po pryamomu puti". Teper' prishlo k vam ot Gospoda vashego yasnoye ukazaniye, rukovodstvo i milost'. Posle sego ne tot li budet nechestiveyshim, kto lozhnymi pochtot znameniya Boga i uklonitsya ot nikh? Tem, kotoryye uklonyatsya ot znameniy nashikh, My vozdadim lyutoy mukoy za to, chto oni uklonyatsya
